channel.title: Hugo on minimis
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on minimis

item.title: Extensions
item.description: Use {{< toc >}} Hugo shortcode to generate table of contents: Table Of Contents Checklist Code highlighting Mermaid diagrams Unsafe Math Default Hugo shortcodes Gist YouTube Twitter Checklist TODO Completed Code highlighting Use highlight shortcode or Markdown-style code fences with attributes to highlight regions, set line numbers etc. go {linenos=inline,hl_lines=[8,"15-17"],linenostart=199} 199// GetTitleFunc returns a func that can be used to transform a string to 200// title case. 201// 202// The supported styles are 203// 204// - "Go" (strings.
